g.text: Define module, number of teeth, face width,
Use CAD and FEA software for validation.
Cut bar or forging to blank length with allowance
Cut Blank to Length / Prepare Stock
Face both ends and rough the outer diameter
close to final size on a lathe.
Drill and bore the center hole and rough keyway relief,
Generate external gear teeth by hobbing or shaping
Cut internal spline or keyway using a broaching press.
to achieve strength and wear resistance.
Finish bore and hub to final tolerances
Grind, hone, or shave teeth to improve
Apply surface strengthening or protective coating
to enhance fatigue and corrosion resistance.
Check tooth accuracy, runout, and dimensions
Apply protective oil and pack carefully
to prevent rust and handling damage.
